verbose_text: In addition to the canonical function of binding to their target messenger RNAs, tumor secreted miR-21 and miR-29a may function through other mechanisms, for example, by binding as ligands to receptors of the TLR family, murine TLR7 and human TLR8 in immune cells and triggering a TLR mediated prometastatic inflammatory response, to regulate macrophage polarization.
